# CoreX ai_audio - nemo

This package provides an implementation of the CoreX ai_audio interface for nemo.

## Installation
~~~bash
pip install corex-ai_audio-nemo
~~~

## Usage
~~~python
from corex_ai_audio_nemo.handler import NemoHandler
handler = NemoHandler()
handler.example_method()
~~~
